001package io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.format;
002
003import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogProperties;
004import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogProperty;
005import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogProperty.Property;
006
007/**
008 * Builder to create {@link io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.format.PatternConfig }.
009 * <table class="table">
010 * <caption><strong>Properties retrieved from LogProperties</strong></caption>
011 * <tr>
012 * <th>Property Pattern</th>
013 * <th>Type</th>
014 * <th>Required</th>
015 * <th>Default</th>
016 * <th>Description</th>
017 * </tr>
018 * <tr>
019 * <td><code>{@value PROPERTY_zoneId }</code></td>
020 * <td><code>String (converted)</code></td>
021 * <td><code>false</code></td>
022 * <td><code>null</code></td>
023 * <td></td>
024 * </tr>
025 * <tr>
026 * <td><code>{@value PROPERTY_lineSeparator }</code></td>
027 * <td><code>String</code></td>
028 * <td><code>false</code></td>
029 * <td><code>null</code></td>
030 * <td></td>
031 * </tr>
032 * <tr>
033 * <td><code>{@value PROPERTY_ansiDisabled }</code></td>
034 * <td><code>Boolean</code></td>
035 * <td><code>false</code></td>
036 * <td><code>null</code></td>
037 * <td></td>
038 * </tr>
039 * </table>
040 */
041public final class PatternConfigBuilder implements io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogBuilder<PatternConfigBuilder,io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.format.PatternConfig> {
042
043        /**
044         * The properties to be retrieved from config will have
045         * this prefix.
046         */
047        static final String PROPERTY_PREFIX = "logging.pattern.config.{name}.";
048        
049        /**
050         * <code>{@value #PROPERTY_zoneId } = java.time.ZoneId</code> 
051         */
052        static final String PROPERTY_zoneId = PROPERTY_PREFIX + "zoneId";
053        /**
054         * <code>{@value #PROPERTY_lineSeparator } = java.lang.String</code> 
055         */
056        static final String PROPERTY_lineSeparator = PROPERTY_PREFIX + "lineSeparator";
057        /**
058         * <code>{@value #PROPERTY_ansiDisabled } = java.lang.Boolean</code> 
059         */
060        static final String PROPERTY_ansiDisabled = PROPERTY_PREFIX + "ansiDisabled";
061        
062        private final String propertyPrefix;
063        final Property<java.time.ZoneId> property_zoneId;
064        final Property<java.lang.String> property_lineSeparator;
065        final Property<java.lang.Boolean> property_ansiDisabled;
066        
067        private final java.lang.String name;
068        private java.time.@org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable ZoneId zoneId = null;
069        private java.lang.@org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable String lineSeparator = null;
070        private java.lang.@org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable Boolean ansiDisabled = null;
071        private java.util.function.@org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable Function<java.lang.String, java.lang.@org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable String> propertyFunction;
072        
073        /**
074         * Create a builder for {@code io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.format.PatternConfig }.
075         * @param name will fill <code>{name}</code> in <code>logging.pattern.config.{name}.</code>. 
076         */
077        public PatternConfigBuilder(
078                        java.lang.String name
079                        ) {
080                java.util.Map<String,String> prefixParameters = java.util.Map.of(
081                                "name", name
082                        );
083                this.propertyPrefix = LogProperties.interpolateKey(PROPERTY_PREFIX, prefixParameters);
084                this.name = name;
085                property_zoneId = Property.builder()
086                        .map(_v -> io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.format.PatternConfigurator.convertZoneId(_v))
087                        .build(LogProperties.interpolateKey(PROPERTY_zoneId, prefixParameters));
088
089                property_lineSeparator = Property.builder()
090                                                .build(LogProperties.interpolateKey(PROPERTY_lineSeparator, prefixParameters));
091
092                property_ansiDisabled = Property.builder()
093                        .ofBoolean()
094                        .build(LogProperties.interpolateKey(PROPERTY_ansiDisabled, prefixParameters));
095
096        }
097
098
099        /**
100         * Sets propertyFunction.
101         * 
102         * Default is <code>null</code>.
103         * @param propertyFunction not configurable through properties 
104         * @return this builder.
105         */
106        public PatternConfigBuilder propertyFunction(java.util.function.@org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable Function<java.lang.String, java.lang.@org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable String> propertyFunction) {
107                this.propertyFunction = propertyFunction;
108                return this;
109        }
110
111        
112        /**
113         * Sets zoneId.
114         * 
115         * Default is <code>null</code>.
116         * @param zoneId <code>{@value #PROPERTY_zoneId } = java.time.ZoneId</code> 
117         * @return this builder.
118         */
119        public PatternConfigBuilder zoneId(java.time.@org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable ZoneId zoneId) {
120                this.zoneId = zoneId;
121                return this;
122        }
123        
124        /**
125         * Sets lineSeparator.
126         * 
127         * Default is <code>null</code>.
128         * @param lineSeparator <code>{@value #PROPERTY_lineSeparator } = java.lang.String</code> 
129         * @return this builder.
130         */
131        public PatternConfigBuilder lineSeparator(java.lang.@org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable String lineSeparator) {
132                this.lineSeparator = lineSeparator;
133                return this;
134        }
135        
136        /**
137         * Sets ansiDisabled.
138         * 
139         * Default is <code>null</code>.
140         * @param ansiDisabled <code>{@value #PROPERTY_ansiDisabled } = java.lang.Boolean</code> 
141         * @return this builder.
142         */
143        public PatternConfigBuilder ansiDisabled(java.lang.@org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable Boolean ansiDisabled) {
144                this.ansiDisabled = ansiDisabled;
145                return this;
146        }
147        
148        /**
149         * Creates {@code io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.format.PatternConfig } from this builder.
150         * @return {@code io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.format.PatternConfig }.
151         */
152        public io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.format.PatternConfig build() {
153                return io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.format.PatternConfigurator.provideFormatterConfig(
154                                this.name
155                                , this.zoneId
156                                , this.lineSeparator
157                                , this.ansiDisabled
158                                , this.propertyFunction
159                                );
160        }
161        
162        @Override
163        public PatternConfigBuilder fromProperties(LogProperties properties) {
164                var __v = LogProperty.Validator.of(this.getClass());
165                var _zoneId = property_zoneId.get(properties).or(this.zoneId);
166                __v.addIfError(_zoneId);
167                var _lineSeparator = property_lineSeparator.get(properties).or(this.lineSeparator);
168                __v.addIfError(_lineSeparator);
169                var _ansiDisabled = property_ansiDisabled.get(properties).or(this.ansiDisabled);
170                __v.addIfError(_ansiDisabled);
171                __v.validate();
172                this.zoneId = _zoneId.valueOrNull();
173                this.lineSeparator = _lineSeparator.valueOrNull();
174                this.ansiDisabled = _ansiDisabled.valueOrNull();
175                return this;
176        }
177        
178        /**
179         * Turns the builder into java.util.Properties like Map skipping values that are null.
180         * @param consumer apply is called where first arg is key and second is value.
181         */
182        public void toProperties(java.util.function.BiConsumer<String, String> consumer) {
183                var _zoneId = this.zoneId;
184                if (_zoneId != null) {
185                        consumer.accept(property_zoneId.key(), property_zoneId.propertyString(_zoneId));
186                }
187                var _lineSeparator = this.lineSeparator;
188                if (_lineSeparator != null) {
189                        consumer.accept(property_lineSeparator.key(), property_lineSeparator.propertyString(_lineSeparator));
190                }
191                var _ansiDisabled = this.ansiDisabled;
192                if (_ansiDisabled != null) {
193                        consumer.accept(property_ansiDisabled.key(), property_ansiDisabled.propertyString(_ansiDisabled));
194                }
195        }
196        
197        /**
198         * The interpolated property prefix: {@value #PROPERTY_PREFIX}.
199         * @return resolved prefix which should end with a "<code>.</code>".
200         */
201        @Override
202        public String propertyPrefix() {
203                return this.propertyPrefix;
204        }
205        
206}
